ComicInfo.Summary:
Morpheus finally faces off with Dr. Destiny for the final piece of the Dream Kingâ€™s objects of power--the Dreamstone! Warring across the landscape of The Dreaming, the two beings wage psychological war with the fate of the universe hanging in the balance!
Morpheus tries to talk sense to Doctor Destiny, which of course proves fruitless. Dr. Destiny insists on a showdown, which the Dream King is willing to engage in - provided that the battle be fought in the Dreaming.
